@graph.name: Route4Me Academic - Last-Mile Optimization Technology for Education - Route4Me
@graph.description: Give your students free access to cutting edge route optimization technology. Integrate Route4Me's interactive tools into your classroom for transportation, spatial modeling, business, and machine learning education.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, academic software, transportation education, spatial modeling, logistics education, business education, machine learning education, classroom technology, academic research tools, routing simulation, logistics simulation, transportation research

@graph.name: Route4Me Academic Program
@graph.description: Route4Me Academic provides cutting-edge last-mile optimization technology for education. It helps engage students by combining theoretical knowledge with hands-on routing and logistics optimization software. The platform enables students to build use cases with their own sample data, collaborate on team projects, visualize research materials using interactive maps, and more. Route4Me's telematics and optimization solutions serve as an academic sandbox for transportation modeling, testing theories, conducting experiments, and supporting machine learning, data science, and AI workloads. This cloud-based platform is accessible from any computer, through web applications, native mobile apps, and offers SDKs and APIs for engineering students.
